readable.title: 3347798761_5c5260b000
readable.content: A dirt bike rider is in the air pulling off a trick . A dirt biker who is sideways in the air having come off of a dirt jump . A motorbiker racer performs an aerial stunt as he flies over a dirt hill in the woods . A person on a dirt bike doing a trick over a hill . A person on a dirt bike soaring through the air sideways .
